metadata.name: Chantal
metadata.description:
Portrait from ILLA IPSA  (latin, meaning "SHE HERSELF") series, celebrating women's diversity

ILLA IPSA (She Herself)...

...is a wonder to behold. A complex tapestry of experiences and emotions woven together to create a unique and beautiful masterpiece. She is fierce and gentle, confident and vulnerable, strong and sensitive.

... is a symphony of experiences, emotions, and perspectives. She is a mosaic of colors, each one representing a different facet of her being.

... carries with her a story that is uniquely hers. She has battled demons and conquered fears, and through it all, she has emerged victorious. She has embraced her vulnerabilities and turned them into strengths. She has learned to love herself, flaws and all, and in doing so, she has become a beacon of hope and inspiration for others.

... is a testament to the resilience, power, and beauty of women everywhere.

She is a woman, and her diversity is something to be celebrated.
